item.title: Escaping the Echo Chamber - BoardSeat Kickstarter
item.description:
Escaping the Echo Chamber - BoardSeat Kickstarter

Anyone who has sat down to discuss something weighty or contentious with their friends has experienced the echo chamber. We tend to surround ourselves with people who are like us, similar in beliefs and interests. This is good for friendships, where too much contention can sleep disaster, but bad for business.
